capsules_submitted.utterance: Flitwick is indeed my title and it's a mantra that I live by as a professor.

I'm Valeria, and I have to say that Flitwick is an amazing title for a professor - it's so unique and memorable. As a mantra, it really resonates with me, you know? It's like a personal affirmation that I can carry with me every day. The sentiment behind it is just so positive and uplifting, it makes me feel all warm and fuzzy inside.

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Flitwick is a female. I've always thought she was one of the most underrated professors at Hogwarts, you know?
